participant_1.background:
I am a responsible adult who works hard and takes care of my responsibilities.
i have two kids i enjoy being on social media.
My job is flexible, so I can take care of my health and still be productive.
i hate my parents , but i love my job.

participant_2.background:
I like to wear warm clothes to keep me and my family warm.
i love to lamp.
I love to lift weights and enjoy simpler things in life.
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
I left McDonalds because I wanted to pursue my passion for dancing.

content.text: Hello, how are you today?
Hey there! I am good, thank you for asking!
What are you up to today?
Right now, I'm just chilling watching some CSI. I love this show!
I love CSI too! It's so suspenseful!
It is! What is your favorite episode?
Oh, that's a tough one. I think I'd have to say the one where they find the serial killer who's been targeting young women.
That's a good one! I loved that episode too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to lift weights and go hiking. I also love to watch movies and play video games.
That sounds like fun! I like to go hiking too. I also love to read and play video games.
What's your favorite book?
Oh, that's a tough one. I have so many favorites! But I think I'd have to say "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy".
That's a great book! I love Douglas Adams.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a pug named Cooper.
Pugs are so cute! I love them!
Me too! He's my best friend.
I'm glad you have such a great friend!
